version_description: Razer values user privacy and has made immediate changes on the terms of its services in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) that will be enforced on May 25, 2018. Users are now required to accept the new terms before they will b
You can now use our app and services without needing an email! If you'd like full access to our app and services though – we'd strongly recommend creating a Razer ID for your Razer fix.
